column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Cindy - Thank you very much for the 5-star review. WE LOVE YOUR FEEDBACK! I'm also proud to call you one of our "Midtown Regulars." We wouldn't be where we are today without folks like yourself
column2: so on behalf of our entire staff
column3: I would just like to thank you again for your kind words and patronage.
